subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yu Darvish lost his bid for a no-hitter in the ninth inning Friday on a David Ortiz single. In the seventh, though, a play often ruled a hit was scored an error.
snippet: Yu Darvish lost his bid for a no-hitter in the ninth inning Friday on a David Ortiz single. In the seventh, though, a play often ruled a hit was scored an error.
